import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {FORM_VALUES_NAME} from '../redux/createPage/createPageTypes' import {FORM_VALUES_ADDRESS} from '../redux/createPage/createPageTypes' import {FORM_VALUES_RATING} from '../redux/createPage/createPageTypes' import {FORM_VALUES_TYPE} from '../redux/createPage/createPageTypes' import {FORM_VALUES_PICTURE} from '../redux/createPage/createPageTypes' import {formValues} from '../redux' import './CreatePage.css'; class CreatePage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleInputChange = this.handleInputChange.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(event) { console.log(this.state); } handleInputChange(event) { const target = event.target; switch(target.id) { case 'name': this.props.formValues(FORM_VALUES_NAME, target.value) break; case 'address': this.props.formValues(FORM_VALUES_ADDRESS, target.value) break; case 'rating': this.props.formValues(FORM_VALUES_RATING, target.value) break; case 'type': this.props.formValues(FORM_VALUES_TYPE, target.value) break; case 'picture': this.props.formValues(FORM_VALUES_PICTURE, target.value) break; default: } } render() { return (

Add a New Tourist Place

Range 1 to 5

Beach
Hills
Fountain
Landmark
); } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch =>{ return { formValues: (type, payload) => dispatch(type, payload) } } export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CreatePage);
